ygData.subject: DomainScope allows URLs to get into queue that are out of domain
ygData.msgSnippet: I m still trying to figure out how it happens, but with DomainScope I am seeing cases where URLs that are not part of the seed domains get included.  Can

Subject: DomainScope allows URLs to get into queue that are out of domain

I'm still trying to figure out how it happens, but with DomainScope I am 
seeing cases where URLs that are not part of the seed domains get 
included.  Can someone tell me:

1) Whether (and where) URIs getting queued get filtered by domain, and
2) where the URIs that managed to get queued which are not part of the 
seed domains would get filtered out?

Thanks,
Karl Wright
